sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lao zhai 勞瘵 , exhaustion consumption. San yin ji yi bing zheng fang lun 三因極一病證方論 10: 夫 骨蒸、殗殜、伏連、屍疰、勞疰、蟲疰、毒疰、熱疰、冷疰、食疰、鬼 疰等，皆曰傳屍者 , “Now, bone steaming, progressive calamity, hidden link, corpse [evil] attachment-illness, exhaustion attachment-illness , bug attachment-illness, poison attachment-illness, heat attachment-illness, cold attachment-illness, food attachment-illness, and demon attachment-illness; all these are examples of corpse [evil] transmission”. Lei chan 羸顫 , emaciation with shivering [1]

Illness Sign of an uncontrolled shivering movement of the entire body because of depletion and weakness. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry yin yu 茵芋：治一切冷風，筋骨怯弱羸顫 , “It cures all types of cold wind, and weakness of the sinews and bones, as well as emaciation with shivering ”.
